user_instruction: 'Send out a group email with the latest updates on our office environment and workflow changes. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["all-staff@innosoft.com"],"subject":"Upcoming Office Renovation & AgileBoost Workflow Roll-out – What to Expect","body":"Hi Team,

We have two important updates to share regarding our workplace and the way we manage projects:

1. Office Renovation (Starts next Monday – 4 weeks)
   • Work will focus on the ground floor, including common work areas and the break room.
   • During this period those spaces will be inaccessible; all teams will temporarily relocate to the upper floors.
   • Please label any personal equipment before Friday so Facilities can move it safely.
   • We will send weekly progress photos and noise-impact notices in the #office-updates Slack channel.

2. AgileBoost Workflow Implementation (Kicks off the week of 21 Feb – 6 weeks total)
   • Phase 1 – Initial Analysis: Mapping current processes and pinpointing improvements.
   • Phase 2 – Team Training: Hands-on workshops (schedule attached in the calendar invite) so everyone is comfortable with the new toolset.
   • Phase 3 – System Setup & Pilot: Configuring AgileBoost and running a small pilot project to iron out any kinks.
   • Phase 4 – Full Roll-out: Company-wide switch with on-call support.

What you need to do now
   • Renovation: Make sure to clear items from the ground-floor desks by 5 p.m. Friday.
   • AgileBoost: Accept the training session invite that best fits your schedule.

Thank you for your flexibility as we modernise both our space and our workflow. These improvements are designed to give us a safer, more comfortable environment and a more streamlined way of delivering projects.

Questions? Feel free to message Facilities about the renovation or the PMO about AgileBoost.

Best,
John
"}

formatted_items.content: Sent! A group email summarizing the office renovation timeline and the AgileBoost workflow roll-out has been delivered to all-staff@innosoft.com.
